footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Gorou | Update Date: 08/16/2022 | Editor: SirDerpyHerp#7903

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Warbow__
ER stat stick + extra particles from its passive, you get one for free too. It does require CRIT Rate to proc the passive reliably, but it's not an issue for Gorou as he can use a CRIT Rate circlet without losing buffs.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Sacificial Bow, Elegy for the End

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% or Energy Recharge |<goblet> DEF% |<circlet> CRIT Rate or DEF%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Inuzaka All-round Defense
**2)** Elemental Burst: Juuga - Forward Unto Victory
**3)** Normal Attack: Ripping Fang Fletching

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
He only needs to stack ER and CRIT Rate if he's using Fav, DEF% is only wanted when he's C4 for his heals.
You only need to level up his Elemental Skill as his buff scale exclusively from his Elemental Skill.
